articles.title: 2 men charged in turtle-poaching ring
articles.description: FORT MYERS, Fla. (AP) — Florida wildlife officials say they've arrested two men for poaching thousands of turtles and selling them.
articles.content:
FORT MYERS, Fla. (AP) Florida wildlife officials say they've arrested two men for poaching thousands of turtles and selling them.

articles.author: By BUSABA SIVASOMBOON Associated Press
articles.title: Better protection sought for Thailand's helmeted hornbill
articles.description: BANGKOK (AP) — Time is running out for Thailand's dwindling population of helmeted hornbills thanks to poaching of the exotic birds for the ivory-like casques atop their big red and yellow beaks.
articles.content:
BANGKOK (AP) Time is running out for Thailand's dwindling population of helmeted hornbills thanks to poaching of the exotic birds for the ivory-like casques atop their big red and yellow beaks.
The species, known by the scientific name Rhinoplax vigil, is li… [+4508 chars]

articles.title: State wildlife officials investigate bull elk poaching case
articles.description: OROFINO, Idaho (AP) — Idaho wildlife officials are investigating after someone shot a bull elk and then left it to waste near Orofino.
articles.content:
OROFINO, Idaho (AP) Idaho wildlife officials are investigating after someone shot a bull elk and then left it to waste near Orofino.

articles.title: Collins proposal to crack down on wildlife poaching OK'd
articles.description: BANGOR, Maine (AP) — A bill designed to protect endangered species that was authored in part by Maine's Republican senator has passed the U.S. Senate.
articles.content:
BANGOR, Maine (AP) A bill designed to protect endangered species that was authored in part by Maine's Republican senator has passed the U.S. Senate.

articles.title: Wyoming man sentenced to 9 months in jail for poaching deer
articles.description: SHERIDAN, Wyo. (AP) — A man has been sentenced to serve nine months in jail for illegally killing deer in northern Wyoming.
articles.content:
SHERIDAN, Wyo. (AP) A man has been sentenced to serve nine months in jail for illegally killing deer in northern Wyoming.

articles.title: Colorado biologist gets probation for selling bobcat pelts
articles.description: GRAND JUNCTION, Colo. (AP) — A former U.S. Fish and Wildlife biologist who pleaded guilty to selling Colorado bobcat pelts to fur traders has been sentenced to three years of probation and ordered to pay $55,100 in fines and restitution.
articles.content:
GRAND JUNCTION, Colo. (AP) A former U.S. Fish and Wildlife biologist who pleaded guilty to selling Colorado bobcat pelts to fur traders has been sentenced to three years of probation and ordered to pay $55,100 in fines and restitution.

articles.title: Alligator without head or tail found near Florida boat ramp
articles.description: STUART, Fla. (AP) — A mutilated, dead alligator has been found in Florida, the second in less than a month.
articles.content:
STUART, Fla. (AP) A mutilated, dead alligator has been found in Florida, the second in less than a month.
The most recent discovery came when a kayaker spotted the carcass near a boat ramp in Stuart on Thursday. That's on Florida's east coast.

articles.title: Bald eagle euthanized after being shot in northern Michigan
articles.description: MANISTEE, Mich. (AP) — Michigan officials say a bald eagle was euthanized after being shot by hunters in Manistee County who said they mistook it for a goose.
articles.content:
MANISTEE, Mich. (AP) Michigan officials say a bald eagle was euthanized after being shot by hunters in Manistee County who said they mistook it for a goose.

articles.title: Ginseng hunters say secrecy part of their hobby
articles.description: CEDAR RAPIDS, Iowa (AP) — Like morel mushroom hunters — or maybe even more so — ginseng diggers are quiet about their hobby.
